translation: This indweller in the body of everyone is ever indestructible, O Arjuna; therefore, you should not grieve for any creature.
commentary: 2.30 Carnal Indweller? Always always? Invincible indestructible? This is this? Dehe in the body? of all of all? India Or Bharata? Therefore therefore? all (for) all? Ghost creatures? Not not? You thou? shochitum to grieve? You deserve (thou) shouldst.Commentary The body of any creature may be destroyed but the Self cannot be killed. Therefore you should not grieve regarding any creature whatsoever? Bhishma or anyone else.
